title: Apple.Logic.Pro.X.v10.0.1.MacOSX
description:
Name: Logic Pro X
Version: - 10.0.1

Mac Platform: Intel
Includes: K

OS version: OS X v10.8.4 or later
Processor type(s) & speed: 64 Bit CPU
RAM minimum: 4GB
Display with 1280-by-768 resolution or higher
Requires 64-bit Audio Units plug-ins
Minimum 5GB of disk space. 35GB of optional content available via in-app download.

Link for more information: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/logic-pro-x/id634148309?mt=12

This is an update for the version found here:
 <a href="
https://brokenstones.me/details.php?id=74018" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://brokenstones.me/details.php?id=74018</a>

Description

Logic Pro X is the most advanced version of Logic ever. Sophisticated new tools for professional songwriting, editing, and mixing are built around a modern interface thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s designed to get creative results quickly and also deliver more power whenever itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s needed. Logic Pro X includes a massive collection of instruments, effects, and loops, providing a complete toolkit to create amazing-sounding music.

Powerful New Interface
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Consolidate and control multiple tracks or create rich, layered instruments with Track Stacks
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Smart Controls allow you to manipulate multiple plug-ins and parameters with a single move
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ An enhanced Mixer lets you move, copy, and bypass channel inserts more efficiently
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly re-order song sections and try new ideas using Arrangement Markers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Autosave keeps your work safe and sound
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ See and edit more of your performances in the Score editor with a new wrapped view

Professional Music Production
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fix out-of-tune vocals and change the melodies of recorded audio with Flex Pitch
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Manipulate the timing and tempo of any recording with ease using Flex Time
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Record and seamlessly punch in and out of one or multiple tracks
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keep takes organized with take folders and build comps quickly with Quick Swipe Comping
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Record automation for any channel strip or plug-in parameter on the fly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create and mix music from anywhere in the room using Logic Remote on iPad
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 64-bit architecture supports large projects containing hundreds of tracks and sampled instruments

Drum Production
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create drum tracks that play with your song using Drummer, a virtual session player
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose among 15 distinct drummers that can take your direction and perform millions of unique grooves
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Build your own kit with Drum Kit Designer using a diverse collection of deeply sampled, professionally mixed snares, toms, kicks, hi-hats, and cymbals
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Produce electronic drum sequences with Ultrabeat

Keyboards and Synths
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instantly turn a simple chord into a rich performance with the Arpeggiator
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Transform simple ideas into elaborate performances using nine MIDI plug-ins
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create classic Ã¢â‚¬â„¢70s- and Ã¢â‚¬â„¢80s-style synthesizer tracks using Retro Synth
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play faithful models of vintage keyboards with Vintage B3, Vintage Electric Piano, and Vintage Clav
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Get inspired by a collection of synths that provide analog, wavetable, FM, and physical modeling synthesis
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play or create a wide variety of rich sampled instruments with the EXS24 Sampler

Guitar and Bass Gear
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Build your own guitar or bass rig with Amp Designer using vintage and modern amps, cabinets, and mics
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Design a custom Pedalboard from a collection of delay, distortion, and modulation stompboxes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Access the Tuner with just a click to quickly get in tune

Creative and Production Effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play your sounds through realistic acoustic spaces using Space Designer convolution reverb
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use a range of multi-tap, vintage tape, and stereo delays
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add movement to your tracks with a variety of modulation effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Get the perfect mix with a variety of EQs, dynamics, and other mixing tools
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Put the finishing touch on your project using a collection of mastering plug-ins

Sound Library
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Over 1500 instrument and effect Patches
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ More than 800 sampled instruments
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 30 urban and electronic drum machine Patches
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 3600 Apple Loops in modern urban and electronic genres

Compatibility
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Expand your instrument and effects library with third-party Audio Units-compatible plug-ins
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import and export XML to support Final Cut Pro X workflows
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export and share your songs directly to SoundCloud
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open projects from Logic 5 or later


Changes:

This update improves overall stability and performance issues including:

* Fixes an issue that could cause content downloading to stall
* 24-bit audio files are no longer converted to 16-bit when exporting projects to AAF
* Improves stability when switching between audio editors while Flex Pitch is enabled
* Track Stacks that contain both software instrument and audio tracks will no longer
* be inadvertently flattened by loading a Patch
* Tuner is now available when selecting a Track Stack containing audio tracks
* Addresses graphic and selection behavior issues in the Score Editor


To use with previous versions of Mac OS X (instructions courtesy of BS user Kalko):
1. Localize Logic Pro X.app in the Application folder.
2. Right-click on it and click on "Show Package Content"
3. Using a text editor open the file called "info.plist"
4. Using the function "Find" look up for the word "version"
5. Right at the end of the .plist document you will find these lines:
LSMinimumSystemVersion
10.8.4
6. Just edit the second line modifying the minimum OS X system version. (for example: 10.7.4)
7. Save the new .plist document and enjoy Logic Pro X!
